alert.note: Alert for Seminole (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Seminole and central Orange Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 240 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over College Park, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Winter Park, Casselberry, Maitland and Orlando International Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central Florida.
